public class StudentControl

    • changeRegdIndex

      public static void changeRegdIndex​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String courseId, java.lang.String oldIndex, java.lang.String newIndex) throws java.io.IOException
      Logic method for changing the index number of a course student is registered for.
      Parameters:
      username - User name of student.
      courseId - Course code.
      oldIndex - Index number to change from.
      newIndex - Index number to change to.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • swopPeerIndex

      public static void swopPeerIndex​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String peerUser, java.lang.String courseId, java.lang.String yourIndex, java.lang.String peerIndex) throws java.io.IOException
      Logic method for swapping the index number of a course student is registered for, with another student.
      Parameters:
      user - User name of student initiating the swap.
      peerUser - User name of student willing to swap.
      courseId - Course code.
      yourIndex - Index number of user.
      peerIndex - Index number of swapping peer.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
